title: Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai and Tata Motors reduce wholesale deliveries amid low consumer demand
description: Top car makers Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, and Tata Motors have reduced wholesale deliveries to dealerships due to subdued consumer demand compared to last year, leading to inventory buildup. Conversely, Kia and Toyota are increasing dealer supplies. The industry is preparing for the festive season, starting with Ganesh Chaturthi.
